name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Explore the stunning open-world of Los Santos and Blaine County in Rockstar's groundbreaking action-adventure game.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Become Geralt of Rivia, a monster slayer for hire, in this vast open-world RPG.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Experience an epic tale of life in America's unforgiving heartland in Rockstar Games' critically acclaimed open-world Western game.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Step into a world of discovery, exploration, and adventure in this acclaimed open-world game.

name: Super Mario Odysse
description: Embark on a new journey with Mario and his new ally, Cappy, in a massive, globe-trotting 3D adventure.

name: Overwatch
description: Join the fight for the future and choose your hero from a diverse cast of soldiers, scientists, adventurers, and oddities.

name: Fortnite
description: Jump into a massive 100-player Battle Royale and fight to be the last one standing in this popular online game.

name: Minecraft
description: Create and explore your own virtual world, build structures, and survive against monsters in this sandbox game.

name: FIFA 21
description: Experience the latest installment of the world's most popular football simulation game, featuring improved graphics and gameplay.

name: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: Enter the arena of 150-player Battle Royale, experience new modes, and fight to survive in this intense first-person shooter game.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: Become Eivor, a legendary Viking raider, and lead your clan to settle in the rich lands of England's Dark Ages.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Enter the dangerous world of Night City, where power, glamour, and body modification are the norm in this futuristic open-world RPG.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
description: Gather your favorite characters from various gaming franchises and battle it out in this ultimate crossover fighting game.

name: Rocket League
description: Combine soccer with driving in this high-octane, physics-based multiplayer game.

name: Among Us
description: Work together with crewmates to complete tasks on a spaceship, but beware of impostors among you in this multiplayer game.

name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: Create your paradise on a deserted island, interact with charming animal villagers, and enjoy the peaceful life in this simulation game.

name: League of Legends
description: Choose from a roster of powerful champions and battle it out in this highly competitive online multiplayer game.

name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
description: Join terrorists or counter-terrorists and engage in tactical first-person shooter battles in this classic game.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: Lead your team of elite operators and engage in intense, tactical multiplayer battles in this acclaimed FPS game.

name: Apex Legends
description: Choose your legend and team up with other players to become the last squad standing in this fast-paced Battle Royale game.
